short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New brand, new appearance, fast transactions, strong security, high trust factor — IDOwallet. Send & receive MVMT tokens and NFT…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New brand, new appearance, fast transactions, strong security, high trust factor — IDOwallet. Send & receive MVMT tokens and NFT using IDOwallet. The extension works on the Movement blockchain and allows users to create multiple wallets in one place.
